name: The Testing Floor
description:
The Testing Floor is a physics-based puzzler.

Take control of the Cuber and teleport through this puzzle-filled world while learning to master the Cuber… Even with the Cuber and all its abilities at your disposal, solving the floors that lay in front of you will be no easy task. What starts as a simplistic puzzler, grows into an equation not easily solvable. A seemingly endless number of floors lay between you and the final exit... can you pass The Testing Floor?

In January 2016, Nicholas Maiefski began building The Testing Floor. Over the course of 3 years, with the help of Nolan Brand’s contribution of immersive music and sound effects, The Testing Floor has become a fully realized game.


Key Features
• Unique physics-based teleportation system and Power Cube abilities
• Over 80+ puzzle-filled floors to solve
• Immersive text-based story
• Fantastic soundtrack to jam to
